data.text: @DadModelo Hello! If you require further information and assistance on SUPER+, just send us your enquiry to support_deals@airasia.com Thank you. -cw

@lolipoppp29 Hai Syahirah! Mengikut sistem, kami mempunyai penerbangan dari KUL-TGG pada 15 September 2022. Sila pastikan aplikasi mudah alih dikemas kini kepada versi terkini atau anda juga boleh membeli tempahan melalui halaman web rasmi kami. Terima kasih atas sokongan anda! -cw

@hzkema Hi @hzkema , As for now, we suggest you clear the "cache and history" from the Setting menu on your web browser (Settings > Privacy and Security menu). In addition, you may try to use AirAsia superApp from your smartphone for a seamless booking process. Thank you -Feri
@zhdksm Kami memohon maaf atas kesulitan yang berlaku, ZahidKasim. Sila DM kami untuk bantuan lanjut. Terima kasih. -cw
@denponingha Hai faizal, sila hantarkan DM kepada kami jika anda ingin membincangkan lebih lanjut mengenai kebimbangan anda. Terima kasih. -cw
@miz_sh4sh4 Hi @miz_sh4sh4, We apologize for the inconvenience caused. You can DM us for further assistance. Thank you. -Noel-
@BfreshRoger Hello! We have replied to you in another tweet of yours, you may reply to it for further assistance. Thank you. -cw

urls.title: AirAsia India (I5 flight) enquiries
urls.description: From 1st February 2021, any related enquiries regarding AirAsia India (I5 flight) bookings, will no longer be available on this AirAsia Support page. If you have any enquiries regarding your AirAsia India flight bookings, please visit https://www.airasia.co.in/ customer-support-home to speak with one of their Customer Support

data.text: @rup_sadi Hi @rup_sadi , we deeply apologize for the rescheduling which affected your travel plans. We hate to do this, however this is our very last option due to operational reasons. If you need any assistance for this concern, please DM us with the booking details. Thank you -Feri
@hitvmput1h Hi, kindly check on the flight available via our official website or apps. Thank you ~Jay

@shikin_lily Hi Lily, as per checking on your case, we notice that your booking has been converted into a travel voucher. We have sent you an email to inform the details and you may check it in the inbox/spam/promotion/social folder. Thank you -irwan

@radinfathiah Hi @radinfathiah, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We suggest you try clearing the cache on your browser and accessing your dashboard again. If the problem persists, kindly DM us for further assistance. Thank you. -Noel-

@MaxBoon1 Hi @MaxBoon1, Allow us to assist you on this matter. Kindly send us your case number (https://t.co/sGZf4OA3iT ) so that we can contact you via email. kindly avoid sharing personal information via this platform for data protection. Thank you very much - Rob

@IkhwanAmin5767 Hi Ikhwan, the credit account allow on flight booking which operated by AirAsia only (except AirAsia X and AirAsia India) and Snap Booking (Hotel+Flight). If your flight is operated by other airlines, please use the other payment method. Kindly refer to https://t.co/W168kyzWgc.

urls.title: All you need to know about Credit Account
urls.description: What is a Credit Account? The amount spent on your flight booking will be reimbursed to you as a Credit Account for you to make future bookings with AirAsia-operated flights. It will be available in your airasia rewards member account under the “Credit Account” option in the same currency which was used to pay for your flight booking. Once you have logged in to your airasia rewards member account on airasia.com or the airasia Super App, select “Credit Account” from the menu and you will be able to see
